response: Common symptoms of heart disease in women include chest pain, shortness of breath, and nausea.
To prevent heart disease, maintain a healthy diet, exercise regularly, and avoid smoking.
Treatments for heart disease may include lifestyle changes, medications, and possibly surgery.
A heart-healthy diet includes fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins.
Regular physical activity, such as brisk walking, can improve heart health.
